forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
